title: This Week's Livestreamed Accelerator Talks
content: Every week during our accelerator program, we have experts come in to share knowledge, tips and strategies with our #500Strong startups. Even if you're not at the 500 lair, you can still benefit from these talks by tuning into our livestream. Here's what we have lined up for this week: Platform Power: Harnessing Google Apps for Massive Distribution Want to supercharge your apps with tips & tricks from Google? Join us for a lunch session as Joe Marini (Google Chrome Store) and Fred Sauer (Google App Engine) share key strategies and tactics for massive distribution. You'll learn the DOs and DON'Ts of creating an app, how to increase your installation stats, and how to best leverage Google's platforms. Watch it May 1st at 1pm, PST. Robert Scoble Shares Key Strategies for an Effective Social Media Plan Hear the king of social talk about startups, social media, and what it takes to get noticed in the tech community. Watch itÂ May 2nd at 1:30pm, PST. We'll keep you updated with a schedule of livestreamed talks each week during our Spring Accelerator, so keep checking back!
